Name: Let's Learn Korean! Vocabulary
About the game: Ready to start speaking Korean? Let's Learn Korean! Vocabulary teaches over 200 Korean words. Learn the names of everyday objects, food, numbers, animals, shapes and more. As you study, you'll earn coins which you can use to unlock mini-games, art and music. Practice reading Korean words in Hangul if you've studied it before. If not, now is the best time to learn! Buy the bundle and play Let's Learn Korean! Hangul .
